summary: I HAVE JUST FOUND OUT THE SEAT BELTS IN MY 1994 PLYMOUTH MINI VAN CAN UNLATCH IN AN ACCIDENT IF A BODY PART OR OBJECT CONTACTS THE RELEASE BUTTON. IF THIS HAPPENS WHICH IS VERY LIKELY IN AN ACCIDENT WE AND OTHERS IN THE SEATS COULD BE SERIOUSLY INJURED OR DIE. I WANT THEM RECALLED AND REPLACED BY DC.   *NLM
